content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (34.5,-86.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving materials
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with associated inserters

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large iron mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Series of furnaces with inserter automation:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests managing input/output
- Connected transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=20-27)
Power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network distributing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction Distance Errors
- Must be within interaction range of target chest/entity when attempting to extract items
- Move closer to the chest at (40.5,-87.5) before attempting extraction

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure regular fuel supply
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - check input supply chains
- Some chests are reaching capacity - implement better output management

### Fluid System Warnings
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections and fluid flow
- Boiler needs fuel to heat water - maintain coal supply

### Belt System Optimization
- Several belt groups show empty status - ensure proper material flow and input supply
- Check belt connections at transition points to prevent bottlenecks
